actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to delegate to the States certain functions with respect to the location and plans for structures, excavations, or fills in or on certain navigable waters.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to delegate to the States specified functions held by him and specified functions held by the Chief of Engineers with respect to the location and plans for structures, excavations, or fills in or on navigable waters of the United States. Requires the Secretary to prescribe criteria for State programs enacted into law by the State in implementing the activities covered by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to delegate to the States certain functions with respect to the location and plans for structures, excavations, or fills in or on certain navigable waters.
